Articles.Content:
Hi,

Long time player, and first time posting on here. Normally my Google-Fu will help me solve any questions i might have for KSP. But for this problem, i haven't found a solution, yet. 

So, i have an issue with undocking on one of my space stations. I right clicked on the dock and clicked "undock" like i've done a million times before, but this time i clicked the button, and the button went away, but the ship didn't undock from my space station. 

I had this issue pop up for the first time a couple weeks ago, but it was fixed after reloading my game. This time, reloading didn't fix it, ship is still "docked" to the space station docking port, and the "undock" button isn't there. 

From what i've gathered, there was/is a mod/program named KML, which has a feature that will correct this dock/undock bug. 

Problem is, i'm running KSP on Mac, and don't have Windows. So i can't run KML to fix this issue. 

Does anyone (on a Mac) have any ideas for how i can fix this?

Edited April 9, 2018 by GoPokes
Are you using Eva struts mod?  I had similar problem with it.

1 hour ago, radonek said:

Are you using Eva struts mod?  I had similar problem with it.

Negative. I'm using KAS/KIS. 

Just used KIS to detach the capsule. So that fixed my current problem.

Still would like to know another/easier method to fix that random bug.
